titles.title: Recognizing the 50th anniversary of the national Job Corps program as it celebrates 50 years of educating and training the Nation's economically disadvantaged youth.
Recognizing the 50th anniversary of the national Job Corps program as it celebrates 50 years of educating and training the Nation's economically disadvantaged youth.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: Recognizes the 50th anniversary of the national Job Corps program.
